OOC: Dewboy... you apparently are highly confused and be;lieve bw, and RID 
are entirely different continuities. BW followed the G1 comic and cartoon 
continuity and in that, the Matrix was used up already. Not the Matrix 
dimension itself, but the device that used its powers. Which was the Autobot 
Matrix of leader ship. And as for everyone having portable DNA scanners in 
BM... BM was a piece of crap IMO as well as the opinion of tohers, it 
butchered the charachters old personalities as well as the old continuity. 
Now we have Robots in Disguise, RID is not in the same continuity as any of 
those shows. Its an en tirely independant show what was dubbed for US 
Release. The toys and everything were changed and modified, it has no hold on 
the continuity. Besides the matrix is already present in the RPG which I 
think either prowl or Iron Raptor has... although I think it may only be a 
small matrix device like that used by Big Convoy and Lio Convoy but im not 
fully sure. However the original matrix of leadership is gone and destroyed...


--part1_e4.1c86e991.2901d193_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
